Location.Description: You are at the Milton Ranch, a famous... or infamous... local landmark you've heard about from whispers and rumors. While the orchard appears to be well-maintained, there also seems to be an uncontrolled wildness to it. Fruit-bearing trees of different varieties are lined in planned rows and straight lines, yet their limbs seem chaotic and unkempt as if reaching out for help. When a bounty of fresh fruits is available, each is unnaturally plump and engorged, a treat to be had.
